title: Search results for "{query}"
coursesDescription: Make sure to check which degree program it belongs to!

groupNotFound.heading: Can't find the group you're looking for?
groupNotFound.description: Sometimes a group (course, degree program, or other) may not exist yet, for example because it was added only recently.
groupNotFound.altText: Or ask directly in the main group
groupNotFound.footer: You can request it to be created in the main group or via email, specifying that you couldn't find it on
